attr.title: Detective Case and Clown Bot in: Murder in the Hotel Lisbon
attr.desc: Join Detective Case and his quirky sidekick Clown Bot in a comedic investigation filled with mystery, humor, and retro charm. It is a classic point-and-click adventure game featuring engaging puzzles, witty dialogue, and a fun narrative.
attr.desc_md:
### Description:
Join Detective Case and his quirky sidekick Clown Bot in a comedic investigation filled with mystery, humor, and retro charm. It is a classic point-and-click adventure game featuring engaging puzzles, witty dialogue, and a fun narrative.

### Game Details:
* Genre: Comedy / Detective / Point-and-Click Adventure
* Languages: Portuguese & English
* Platforms: PC and Consoles
* Developer: Nerd Monkeys
* Inspired by classic adventure games, this title combines witty dialogue, intriguing puzzles, and a distinctive visual style to deliver a unique storytelling experience.

### About Nerd Monkeys:
Founded in April 2013, [Nerd Monkeys](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nerd-monkeys) is a Portuguese game development and publishing studio passionate about captivating storytelling, unique visuals, and meaningful gameplay.
attr.inst: Buy the game and download the Windows version. Copy files into the assets folder.
